description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=3/3. Bankers, you know you’re going to hell! But on the way there's still time to bankrupt a few countries and fill your pockets, you may even have time for a massage at the end of a hard day off loading your debts. A one to four player game where the only thing you have to do is ruin the world and live the dream! Play with a friend for ultimate enjoyment.
